Name: usecatupd
Description: User can update system catalogs. (Even a superuser cannot do\nthis unless this column is true.)

Name: userepl
Description: User can initiate streaming replication and put the system in\nand out of backup mode.

Name: passwd
Description: Password (possibly encrypted); null if none. See pg_authid\nfor details of how encrypted passwords are stored.

Name: valuntil
Description: Password expiry time (only used for password\nauthentication)

Name: useconfig
Description: Session defaults for run-time configuration variables
